title: Shopify Expert - Scrape products from website to shopify store
snippet:
Seeking an expert in product scraping from one website and importing the products into our shopify store. 

The store that the products are on is: http://www.kmart.com/toys-games/b-20007 (please note: we do not own nor have any association with this store. We sell the same products and to save time want to copy the product details over to our new shopify store.

We would like someone who is experienced and who is willing to help us get this job done as quickly as possible. We would prefer someone who has access to a data scraping tool that they currently already use.

I have only included a sample of what products that you will need to import to our store, please note that there is over 1000s of products to do as you will be importing products from toys, clothing, electronics and more.

To apply for this position:
- Must have shopify experience
- Must be experienced in product scraping
- Experience with setting up product catergorys on shopify
- Product listing experience
- Attention to detail

There are some implications invovled. We want all product details but there are certain conditions.

- Products to be scraped must be in a certain price range
- All product images must be resized and to be all of the same size

If you think you can help with this project than lets discuss this and apply now.

THIS POSITION STARTS FIRST THING MONDAY. You will be working in your own timezone
